description: A port town in the Arabasta Kingdom known for its great shops and irresistible perfume. It serves as the first stop for the Straw Hat Pirates in Arabasta, where they resupply and purchase desert travel gear.

keyEvents.title: Ace vs Smoker Battle
keyEvents.description: Ace engages Smoker in combat in Nanohana while the Straw Hats flee to their ship.
keyEvents.significance: Major confrontation between a Whitebeard Pirates commander and a Marine captain.

keyEvents.title: Luffy and Ace Reunion
keyEvents.description: Luffy reunites with Ace in Nanohana after getting separated from his crew. They arm-wrestle and spend time together.
keyEvents.significance: Heartwarming moment between the brothers and important character development.

keyEvents.title: Billions Attack Ace and Luffy
keyEvents.description: Baroque Works Billions agents surround and attack Ace and Luffy in the streets of Nanohana.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the reach of Baroque Works in Arabasta and their aggressive recruitment tactics.

description: The first ship of the Straw Hat Pirates, a caravel gifted to them by Kaya. It serves as their home and base of operations.

keyEvents.title: Crew Reaches Going Merry
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates successfully flee from Smoker and reach the Going Merry, only to realize Luffy is missing.
keyEvents.significance: Creates tension as the crew worries about their separated captain.

keyEvents.title: Celebration with Ace
keyEvents.description: Ace joins the Straw Hat crew aboard the Going Merry for food and celebration, bonding with Luffy's nakama.
keyEvents.significance: One of the few peaceful moments Ace shares with the Straw Hats before the tragic events to come.

statusHistory.reason: Serving as Straw Hat Pirates' ship
